Normal:
```
const { Button } = require('@material-ui/core');
initialState = {
  foo: false
};

<div>
  <Image
    src={state.foo ? "data:image/jpeg;base64," : "https://i.ytimg.com/vi/yaqe1qesQ8c/maxresdefault.jpg"}
    onClick={() => console.log('onClick')}
    aspectRatio={(16/9)}
    disableSpinner
  />
  <Button variant='raised' onClick={() => setState({foo: !state.foo})}>
    Reload
  </Button>
</div>
```

Loading:
```
<Image
  onClick={() => console.log('onClick')}
  src=''
  aspectRatio={(16/9)}
/>
```

Error:
```
<Image
  src="http://lorempixels.com/1600/900/nature/"
  onClick={() => console.log('onClick')}
  aspectRatio={(16/9)}
/>
```
